Description: I have very mild symptoms of covid 19. Headache, sore throat, fatigue. What do I do now? Is it advised to rather stay home, or go to get tested?
DialogueText:
Patient:
I have very mild symptoms of covid 19. Headache, sore throat, fatigue. What do I do now? Is it advised to rather stay home, or go to get tested?
Doctor:
Watch and wait. With very mild symptoms you do not need to be tested.Your temperature is important. if your symptoms worsen or a fever develops or you start coughing and shortness of breath you need to seek help. stay home and treat the symptoms with paracetamol.
